prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Bass, Guitar, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Bass, Guitar, and a Synth Pad, but no Piano.

Style 2:
No Piano is included in this song, but it does have Drums, Bass, Guitar, and a Synth Pad.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Bass, Drums, Guitar, and a Synth Pad, with no Piano.
